author: silviodonato
body:
In 2022-23 we had one scouting muon collection called `hltScoutingMuonPacker`.
Since 2024 it was split to two collection `hltScoutingMuonPackerNoVtx` and `hltScoutingMuonPackerVtx`.
PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44302 replaced `hltScoutingMuonPacker` with  `hltScoutingMuonPackerNoVtx` and `hltScoutingMuonPackerVtx` in the HLT event content definition that is used to define AOD and MINIAOD.
This is necessary for new data/MC and/or data/MC processed with a recent trigger menu.
However we should also keep `hltScoutingMuonPacker` to reprocess old data containing  `hltScoutingMuonPacker`  collection, specifically to perform reMini starting from 22-23 data or MC.

This PR simply adds back the old collection `hltScoutingMuonPacker` in the HLT dataformat: if that collection is present we should definitely save it.

I tried to validate this using `runTheMatrix`, but I only found `2500.301` for the reMini, but it is based on 2024 MC which is a bit pointless.
I would need a similar workflow based on 2022 or 2023 data or MC but it is not present in the matrix (or I didn't find it)

cc: @elfontan @patinkaew
title: Add old hltScoutingMuonPacker in HLT data formats
